eating_disorder_conditions.restrictive_control: rigid control, avoidance of carbs, intense fear of weight gain
eating_disorder_conditions.digestive_block: digestive tension, blocked throat, inability to swallow
eating_disorder_conditions.food_moralization: labeling foods as good/bad, shame after meals, early guilt
eating_disorder_conditions.stress_related_loss: professional hypervigilance, fear of eating, toxic context
eating_disorder_conditions.mild_disconnection: early eating pattern concerns, subtle food relationship issues

SCRIPT_C.title: Let the Body Digest What the Mind Holds On To
